title: Sunday 1st March @ Chepstow Free Pre Season Swap Meet

posts.content:
Sunday 1st March Per Season Meet 9.00hrs till 1400hrs Swap Meet @
National Diving & Activity Centre
Tidenham
Chepstow
Gloucestershire
NP16 7LH
http://www.ndac.co.uk

DATC Team and Friends ...........

Are hosting this unique pre-season gathering and free swap meet for all types of VW's & Classic - Retro Cars in the Upper Car Park of the National Diving & Activity Centre, Chepstow.

Come and see the amazing views, V-Dubs and boxes of rusty parts while sampling the delights of the view from the cafe bar.
There will be a Â£5 charity donation per vehicle, payable as you enter the site in aid of Ty Hafan, http://www.tyhafan.org Children's Hospice and also a few bucket being rattled for further donations.

So throw on some thermals, brrrrrrrrrrrrr, Warm up the Volkswagen, bring your old boxes of spares and help us raise some much needed funds.

Please take time to read the on site rules and warning signs.

For Any Detail Contact

Clive 07737325104

Dave 07817971589

Anthony 07815611245
